2116001.name: Memories of ...
2116001.desc: On Round Start 2nd turn, gain 1 <sprite name="ChargeForceField"><color=#f09745><u><link="FragmentofAuric">Fragment of Auric</color></link></u>

2116002.name: Presence and Breath of an Emperor
2116002.desc:
- At Combat Start, Slash Resistance +0.3 for all enemies.
- When this unit gains [Breath] Potency, gain +1 [Breath] Count as well.
